== Welcome to the Ubuntu Advertising Volunteers list. This is where you can sign up for tasks you're willing to be on the team for. ==

Please add a note under each section about what skills you can help with specifically

ie: (Under Translation) "James Bond - 007.britspy@MI6.com - I can help with translation into Spy messages."

(under "Editors") - "James Bob - bobby.james@james.com - I can help with editing grammatical errors and such. 

== What each Volunteer group does. ==
----
'''Editors/Authors''': Will write documentation, and prepare and finalise scripts

'''Translators''': will translate all information (ie: banners) into different languages...

'''Designers/Graphics''': Will make sure every creation is neat, beautiful, attractive and presentable. "Eye catching..." They will also produce storyboards for an accepted script.

'''Musicians''': Will be responsible for creating the lovely tunes that will accompany our work. 

'''Animators''': Will provide green-screen/animation ability. 

'''Project Leaders''': Will lead each team and be responsible for the well-being and management of the group.
